data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tu, Bin-Bin, Lelej, Arkady S., Chen, Xue-Xin (2014): Review of the genus Cystomutilla André, 1896 (Hymenoptera: Mutillidae: Sphaeropthalminae: Sphaeropthalmini), with description of the new genus Hemutilla gen. nov. and four new species from China. Zootaxa 3889 (1): 71-91, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3889.1.4
